Summary of the Admission Requirement for Memorial University

Application Portal:                                          Online portal

Application Fee (non-refundable):                  84 CAD

Mode of Payment:                                          Visa/Master card

Academic Calendar:                                       Semester-based

Intake Seasons:                                               Fall/Winter/Summer

Work Experience:                                           Required for Business Programs

Financial Aid:                                                 Scholarships

This is to inform all interested students and the entire public that the Memorial University of Newfoundland admission for 2024/2024 academic sessions is open online for Undergraduate Programs. The Memorial University of Newfoundland Admission is open for the fall and winter or summer sessions.

How to Apply for Admission into Memorial University of Newfoundland

To apply for admission into Memorial University of Newfoundland university,

  • Go to https://www.ouac.on.ca/
  • Click on Accéder à monPortail
  • Or Download form https://admissions.Memorial University of Newfoundland.ca/contactandgeneralinformation/
  • Fill same and send it to the Admission Application Email
  • The Memorial University of Newfoundland University Application Deadline 2024

Memorial University of Newfoundland University application time limit is 2024 for Undergraduate/Graduate Admissions is given as follows. All submissions should keep dates.

Students, applying to fall 2024 may apply on a continuing source using the University Of Memorial University of Newfoundland Application Form. Spaces are now limited for all degrees and majors and you may be granted an option if your first choice is no longer obtainable.

Intercontinental applicants applying from high school/secondary school may pertain for the fall entry point, which begins in September the deadline varies.

The University Of Memorial University Of Newfoundland will be using the highest grade reported for any repeated course

Memorial University of Newfoundland Application Fees

 At Memorial University fees differs

  • Admission Fees in addition to the General Application dispensation Fee
  • Bachelor of Technology: $300
  • Bachelor of Maritime Studies: $300
  • Application Fee in addition to General Application dispensation Fee
    • School of Pharmacy
    • Canadian candidate: $125
    • International candidate: $175

How to Pay for Application:

Paying for the admission application form is done online with the help of a Visa/Master card

Visa Process for International Students

The following documents are required from all internationally admitted students.

  • A valid passport
  • A Québec Acceptance Certificate (CAQ), from the Ministry of immigration for programs longer than 6 months
  • Apply for a study permit and visa
  • Quebec’s immigration law requires proof of valid health and hospitalization insurance.
